name: Gabrielle's Ghostly Groove 3D
synopsis: Gabrielle’s having a bad day. She sneezed her soul right out of her body! She’ll have to travel to Monsterville, the home of all things that go bump in the night, to get help. Only by busting out the ghostliest dance moves and thrilling and chilling people will she be able to scare up the power she needs to get herself back into her body! It’s a spooktacular rhythm adventure! Catchy tunes will have you tapping, sliding, and flicking in time to the music! Unlock chilling minigames! Earn tons of terror-ific outfits, items, and more! A fun-filled story with over 30 stages to master!
